Name: Robert
description:
Robert is married and is a father of five children with whom he lives in a five bedroom house in Finge Tubah in the northwest region of Cameroon. He has faced some challenges in life such as the intribal that took away the lives of his beloved parents and an accident he had.

He joined GHAPE in 2016 and has taken and successfully repaid two loans.

With the new loan requested he plans to buy more seedlings, fertilizer, to pay for labor, and to pay transport.

He has a positive attitude that the activity will succeed because he already has a mastery of it and there is an ever ready demand for his products

He says his activity will help the community since he will provide good and healthy foodstuff to them.

With the profit to be gotten from the loan, he will plough back some into his activity, pay hi childrenâ€™s school fees, and provide basic necessities for the family.

He prefers getting a loan from GHAPE because the repayment schedule is moderate, they have low interest rates and a long repayment period, he gets business knowledge before receiving loans, and he does not have to put up collateral.
